title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Clay and Buck set the table for the show. Did defund the police die in NYC last night? Josh Hawley calls for 100,000 new cops. Biden responds to crime wave by going after guns. Thomas Friedman warns Democrats that Defund the Police movement could elect Trump again. Real stats on police shootings. BLM movement is built on lies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
